title: recipes_Strawberry_Soup_III
text:
Title: Strawberry Soup III.
.
Description: Strawberries are blended with buttermilk in this chilled soup sweetened to taste with white sugar..
.
Ingredients:.
- 2 cups strawberries.
- 1 cup buttermilk.
- 1 teaspoon granulated sugar.
.
Instructions:.
- Place strawberries and buttermilk into a blender or food processor and puree. Sweeten with sugar to taste, blend and either serve immediately or chill in the refrigerator..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 52 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 10 g.
cholesterolContent: 3 mg.
fiberContent: 1 g.
proteinContent: 3 g.
saturatedFatContent: 0 g.
sodiumContent: 65 mg.
sugarContent: 8 g.
fatContent: 1 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 4 servings.
